nio/Stock.Description: Returns some stock quotes, along with other information, from [Yahoo Finance](https://finance.yahoo.com/)
nio/Stock.Output:
A list of signals, one per ticker.
The following is an example of fields that are returned in each signal:
```
{
fields: {
change: string,
chg_percent: double,
day_high: double,
day_low: double,
issuer_name: string,
name: string,
price: double,
type: string,
utctime: datetime,
year_high: double,
year_low: double
}
}
```

symbols.description: List of stock tickers to get quotes for
